// Code generated by babylon.js Inspector
// Please keep in mind to define the 'scene' variable before using that code




scene.getMaterialByID("body_material").useLightmapAsShadowmap  = true;
texture.level = 1.61;



 var lightmap = new BABYLON.Texture("textures/candleopacity.png", scene);
    var groundMaterial = new BABYLON.StandardMaterial("groundMaterial", scene);
    groundMaterial.lightmapTexture = lightmap;


var bodyLightMap = new BABYLON.Texture("scenes/hula-girl-demo/body_lightmap.png", scene);
var bodyMaterial = scene.getMaterialByID("body_material")
bodyMaterial.lightmapTexture = bodyLightMap
bodyMaterial.useLightmapAsShadowmap = true;
